metadata.title: CVE-2022-1382 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to5.6.8. This vulnerability is capable of making the radare2 crash, thusaffecting the availability of the system.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
